name: MHTOCSMMHeartFailureArrestDuringProcedure
title: MH TOC SMM ValueSet for the Heart Failure / Arrest During Surgery or Procedure Indicator
description: A ValueSet comprised of ICD-10-CM and ICD-9-CM diagnosis codes for the Severe Maternal Morbidity Heart Failure / Arrest During Surgery or Procedure Indicator. The codes in the ValueSet should be monitored for changes as they vary by source and may be updated.
